body:
Hello Avicus.

Just a little heads up about punishment guidelines since they do affect the community. The senior staff looked into a few rules that came into the question in the last month and has decided to change the how the moderators will be punishing those who break these certain rules.

Racism and Homphobic slurs will be counted as the same type of punishment. This means racism will have less of a harsh punishment for first timers and homophobic slurs will have a harsher punishment. 
Old:
Racism-14d temp ban--> perm
New:
Racism/Homophobic Slurs- 5d tempban --> 7d tempban --> perm

The term "Nigga" has left the classification of a racial term and is now classified as a swear word. The same rules apply for swear words and obvious use of the term to try to get around the racism rule will result in a racism punishment. 

Have a good day.

Rules take place starting in a week.

I can't put things into Announcements >.>

It means it will be treated like a swear word.

If you say it randomly, you will no longer get 14 day temp banned.

But if you say it excessively or if you direct it towards someone, you will be punished..just like swearing.

They (swearing and saying 'nigga' have the same level of tolerance now.
But only the word 'nigga' has the same level of tolerance.

Racism will still get you temp banned.

replies.body:
''Nigga' is often used as an alternative to 'nigg*r', and thus it should be classed as what it is; a derogatory slur intended to offend a person based off of genes that are outside of their control - swearing does not meet this criteria. Players may take offence to this slur, so giving it the same punishment as swearing is preposterous.'

Players are far more likely to take offence to a racial slur than to a swear word, so giving racists a similar punishment to that which they would experience after several cases of swearing is ridiculous. It completely subverts the whole point of having punishments for intolerance in the first place.
